Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at The Sebel Coolangatta in Coolangatta, you'll be on the beach and minutes from The Strand and Coolangatta Beach. This 4.5-star apartment is within close proximity of Greenmount Beach and Kirra Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 93 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private lanais. 36-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include microwaves and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request rollaway/extra beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), tour/ticket assistance, and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services and an elevator (lift). Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at The Sebel Coolangatta in Coolangatta, you'll be on the beach and minutes from The Strand and Coolangatta Beach. This 4.5-star apartment is within close proximity of Greenmount Beach and Kirra Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The Strand - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Coolangatta Beach - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Greenmount Beach - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Kirra Beach - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Centro Tweed - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Border Park Raceway - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Bilinga Beach - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Snapper Rocks - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Point Danger Light - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Point Danger - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Duranbah Beach - 1.6 km / 1 mi
John Flynn Private Hospital - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Fingal Lighthouse - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Tugun Beach - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi
Coolangatta and Tweed Heads Golf Club - 5.2 km / 3.3 mi

The preferred airport for The Sebel Coolangatta is Gold Coast, QLD (OOL-Coolangatta) - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
